entries.airlock_backup: Intruders! We need backup in the airlock!
entries.missing_component2: You need both a gel packet and a filter in order to use this option.
entries.agumented_filter: You have combined the packet and filter to form an enhanced filter.
entries.gel_packet_d: Gel Packet used in filters to counter alum gas located in the mines.
entries.master_artisan_required: Only a master artisan can properly use this facility to create Mandalorian armor.
entries.too_far_from_terminal: You are too far away from the droid terminal to use it.
entries.no_entry: You are unable to enter this structure at this time.
entries.terminal_in_use: Someone else's voice patterns are currently loaded into the memory of this terminal.  Please wait a few moments and try again.
entries.reload_voice_pattern: You can't use the terminal again for a few minutes while the system reloads your voice pattern.
entries.rc_mouse_instructions:
Voice Recognition Software: To control the droid simply state the direction (forward, backward, left, right) and the distance to travel (between 1 and 10).  

If the droid is unavailable, use the command - reset - to acquire a new one.

When the droid is in position use the command - detonate - to set off the explosion.
entries.relock: Security systems at this facility have been cycled and reset.
entries.passkey_mine_d: Passkey that allows access to the mines.
entries.passkey_storage_d: Passkey that will allow access to section B.
entries.passkey_hall_d: Passkey that will allow access to the section A.
entries.door_terminal_d: This terminal controls door locking mechanisms.
entries.allum_warning: Environmental protection is required beyond this point due to high levels of alum gas.
entries.terminal_locked: This terminal is locked until security has investigated the unauthorized access.
entries.denied_access: Unauthorized access to terminal detected. Notifying security.
entries.already_has_filter: You already have a filter. Canceling request.
entries.issue_filter: You have been given a new filter for your rebreather.
entries.entrance_denied: This door is locked. Perhaps you should seek the advice of someone knowledgeable about the Mandalorians on how to enter this base.
entries.access_granted: Correct pass key detected. Access granted.
entries.haldo_failed: You failed to recover the battery in time. Mission failed.
entries.water_pressure_failed: You failed to get the water pressure restored in time. Mission failed.
entries.room_in_use: This room is currently in use.  Try again in a few minutes.
entries.not_enough_armorsmith_skill: Only a Master Armorsmith can use the manufacturing facilities in this room.
entries.not_enough_droidengineer_skill: Only a Master Droid Engineer can use the manufacturing facilities in this room.
entries.not_enough_ingredients: You don't have all the necessary ingredients to craft within this room.
entries.not_enough_tailor_skill: Only a Master Tailor can use the manufacturing facilities in this room.
entries.armorsmith_items: Bounty Hunter Chestplate, Bounty Hunter Boots, or Bounty Hunter Biceps (Left or Right)
entries.droid_engineer_items: Bounty Hunter Bracer (left or right) or a Bounty Hunter Helmet.
entries.master_droidengineer_required: Only a master Droid Engineer can properly use this facility to create Mandalorian armor.
entries.master_armorsmith_required: Only a master Armor Smith can properly use this facility to create Mandalorian armor.
entries.aeration_process_begun: The aeration process has started and will complete shortly.
entries.alum_process_begun: The hardening process has started and will complete shortly.
entries.took_too_long: The manufacturing process halted due to slow input from the end user.
entries.crafting_not_yet: The terminal is displaying numbers and images.  It is not ready for input at this time.
entries.finish_manufacturing: Aeration of the item will complete the process.   Finish the process?
entries.continue_manufacturing:
The alum hardening process is about to begin.  Would you like to continue?  

(WARNING: Once the hardening process has started the base item will no longer be retrievable)
entries.use_terminal: Check the terminal to continue the manufacturing process.  If the process does not continue within the next thirty (30) seconds it will be shut down.
entries.tailored_items: Bounty Hunter gloves, Bounty Hunter Leggings, or a Bounty Hunter Belt.
entries.items_still_needed: The following items are still needed for the manufacturing process to begin:
entries.crafting_finished: The manufacturing process has completed and the new item is being placed in your inventory.
entries.died_during_crafting: Without constant oversight the manufacturing process has failed.
entries.starting_to_craft: All items have been accepted and the manufacturing process is about to begin.
entries.making_something_else: This manufacturing station is currently in the process of creating another type of armor.
entries.already_has_component: An object of this type has already been accepted by the manufacturing station.
entries.same_user_only: Someone else is currently using this manufacturing point.
entries.master_tailor_required: Only a master tailor can properly use this facility to create Mandalorian armor.
entries.protect_fix: Protect the droid while it conducts repairs on the ventilation system.
entries.protect_tools: Protect the droid while it picks up tools needed to repair the ventilation system.
entries.repair_failed: Mission Failure: The droid was destroyed and the ventilation system is still off.
entries.ventilation_repair: Alum Mine ventilation system is now operational.
entries.agumented_rebreather: You successfully add the filter to your rebreather.
entries.not_skilled: You lack the skill in order to augment a rebreather. You must have Engineering 2 in order to make changes to that item.
entries.missing_component: You must have both a rebreather and enhanced filter in order to use this station.
entries.filter_dispenser_d: Dispenser used to store and issue new rebreather filters.
entries.filter_d: Filter attachment for rebreathers to handle special environmental conditions.
entries.workbench_d: Workbench used by technicians to fix mining equipment.
entries.bad_air: The poisonous alum fumes burn your lungs, leaving you gulping for air.
entries.not_authorized: You do not have the proper authorization to access this droid.
entries.need_battery: You have nothing that WED15-I643 needs to fix.
entries.battery_cleaned: WED15-I643 cleans the connections on the battery.
entries.recovered_battery: You pull the missing battery off of the dead miner.
entries.help_me: Please stop hurting me! I think your attack knocked me back to reality but I am afraid that if I don't get some help soon I will not be able to keep control of myself for much longer.
entries.drill_battery_clean_d: Battery Pack for large industrial machines. The connections are clean.
entries.drill_battery_d: Battery Pack used for large industrial machines. The connections seem to be very dirty.
entries.crazed_miner_medicine_d: This is a drug developed to help victims of alum sickness.
entries.access_denied: You are not authorized to access this terminal.
entries.restored_pressure: Water pressure has been restored to the mines.
